description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented Java applications

reduceOptions.fields: /^process_uptime_seconds{application="ep-doc-doctor", container="ep-doc-doctor", datacenter="gtt-old", instance="rzsulv132", job="ep-doc-doctor", prometheus="mp", tags=",API-GATEWAY=public:/v{\\d}/dokumente/freigaben/content/redirect;public:/v{\\d}/dokumente/*/content/redirect;public:/v{\\d}/dokumente/freigabe/*/content/redirect;/v{\\d}/dokumente/**,monitored,path=actuator/prometheus,stage=ps,RATE-POLICY.LIMIT=600,RATE-POLICY.TYPE=USER,RATE-POLICY.REFRESH-INTERVAL=60,tier=mp.unterlagen,", tier="mp.unterlagen"}$/

/^{application="ep-doc-doctor", container="ep-doc-doctor", datacenter="gtt-old", instance="rzsulv132", job="ep-doc-doctor", prometheus="mp", tags=",API-GATEWAY=public:/v{\\d}/dokumente/freigaben/content/redirect;public:/v{\\d}/dokumente/*/content/redirect;public:/v{\\d}/dokumente/freigabe/*/content/redirect;/v{\\d}/dokumente/**,monitored,path=actuator/prometheus,stage=ps,RATE-POLICY.LIMIT=600,RATE-POLICY.TYPE=USER,RATE-POLICY.REFRESH-INTERVAL=60,tier=mp.unterlagen,", tier="mp.unterlagen"}$/

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: Java Spring Boot / JVM (Micrometer)
